name: FuseBall
description:
Welcome to FuseBall! In this action-packed dodgeball like game the goal is to eliminate your opponent before you blow up! 

You play as a bomb and must strike the ball at your opponent or dodge the ball from hitting you. You have a fuse that will slowly decrease over time. Any actions you perform as well will contribute to this decrease. If your fuse runs out, you will explode! Along the way, there will be various powerups to help yourself from staying alive. Will you be the last one standing?

This game is intended to be a 2-player game.  

DISCLAIMER: The game may freeze around the countdown sequence. If this occurs, close the game and restart it. Sorry for the inconvenience and we hope you enjoy FuseBall!

P1 Controls:

- WASD to Move

- C to Strike

- V to Dodge

P2 Controls:

- Arrow Keys to Move

- O to Strike

- P to Dodge
